means: 易碎的东西，易破的东西

sentence.Network_en: Everything breakable had been broken and scattered chaotically about the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 房间里能打碎的东西都打碎了，一片狼藉。

sentence.Network_en: Put away any valuable or breakable objects.
sentence.Network_cn: 把所有值钱的东西和易碎的物品都收起来。

sentence.Network_en: In my dressing - room everything breakable had been stowed away.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我的梳妆室里,一切易碎的物品都已经收藏起来了.

means.word_mean: 易碎的,脆弱的,不稳定的

entry.def: Breakable objects are easy to break by accident.

example.ex: Put away any valuable or breakable objects.
example.tran: 把所有值钱的东西和易碎的物品都收起来。

means.word_mean: 1. an article that is fragile and easily broken;
1. capable of being broken or damaged;

auth_sentence.content: In these models, wood is typically removed from the handles, making them quite thin and easily breakable.
auth_sentence.res_content: In these models, wood is typically removed from the handles, making them quite thin and easily breakable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In these models, wood is typically removed from the handles, making them quite thin and easily breakable.

auth_sentence.content: So carefully, as if handling something breakable, she rolled El Lobo onto his good side.
auth_sentence.res_content: So carefully, as if handling something breakable, she rolled El Lobo onto his good side.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So carefully, as if handling something breakable, she rolled El Lobo onto his good side.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"可以……的,能……的"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上icalbe.

stems_affixes.word_buile: love爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可爱的,惹人爱的
accept接受,承认+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可接受的,合意的
adjust调整+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可调整的
break破坏+able可以……的,能……的→adj.会破的,易碎的
change改变+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可改变的
conceive构思,以为+able形容词结尾→adj.可想象的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的
stems_affixes.word_buile: desire想望,期望+able可以……的,能……的→adj.值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: favor好感,宠爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
im不+pregn攻击+able可以……的,能……的→adj.攻不破的,征服不了的
inflame使燃烧+able可以……的,能……的→inflammable可燃烧的,可激怒的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+viol违反,冒犯+able可以……的,能……的→adj.不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
know知道+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可知的
obtain获得,得到+able可以……的,能……的→adj.能得到的,可到手的
predict预言+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可预言的
prefer更喜欢,宁愿+able可以……的,能……的→adj.更可取的,更好的
tract拉+able可以……的,能……的→能够拉[回来]→易管的
